tahoe.name: macOS Tahoe

tahoe.description: Beautiful, delightful, and familiar look of macOS Tahoe.

cupertino.author: Alexis C
cupertino.description: Inspired by Apple's timeless design philosophy.

sanctum.name: Sanctum
sanctum.author: José Daniel Mourão
sanctum.description: A serene space of retreat, for thought and uninterrupted work.

flexoki.name: Flexoki
flexoki.author: kepano
flexoki.description: Inspired by analog printing inks and warm shades of paper.

softener.name: Softener
softener.author: chuuuby
softener.description: Pastel colors and spacious workspace for your eye comfort.

ocean.name: Ocean
ocean.author: Alexis C
ocean.description: Inspired by [Notion](https://www.notion.com/). Effortlessly minimal, designed for clarity.

minimal.name: Minimal
minimal.author: kepano
minimal.description: A distraction-free experience for your vault.

fluent.name: Fluent
fluent.author: Alexis C
fluent.description: Modern and clean interface, native Windows look and feel.

foundation.name: Foundation
foundation.author: Alexis C
foundation.description: A gentle foundation for thought, designed for comfort and calm.

verseflow.name: Verse Flow
verseflow.author: Jaren Lo
verseflow.description: A joyful, elegant preset focused on readability and ease of use.

stone-gnome.name: Stone Gnome
stone-gnome.author: Bean
stone-gnome.description: An Adwaita inspired theme for a native feel on Gnome, [extra snippets](https://github.com/broad-bean1/Stone-Gnome)

adwaita.name: Adwaita
adwaita.author: Alexis C
adwaita.description: Refined sophistication of GNOME's modern design language.

material.name: Material
material.author: Alexis C
material.description: Vibrant layers and bold shadows from Google's Material Design.

fusion.name: Cupertino Fusion
fusion.author: Alexis C
fusion.description: Inspired by [Craft Docs](https://www.craft.do/), where elegance meets modern minimalism.

bluesahara.name: Blue Sahara

bluesahara.description: Based on Admin theme, but darker.
